entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:01 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 10:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
